Comments_List: I gained appreciation about the full scope of the field and I am ready to use the tools in my dissertation.
A deeper understanding of the psychoanalytic tradition as it relates to literary criticism, postcolonial studies, and other humanistic disciplines.
The course was just perfect, I especially enjoyed how Prof. LaFleur combined in-depth discussion of Freud with contemporary most recently published articles on psychoanalysis.
A greater sense of continuity between readings--either in themselves or as the conceptual work of the course--would be appreciated.
Absolutely! Prof. LaFleur is a dynamic and engaging, very knowledgeable and supportive. The course is an absolute must for any grad student in humanities.
